titleStmt.title: The overthrow of the Scottish Army: or a letter sent from Lieutenant Generall Cromwell to the committee of Lancashire sitting at Manchester, shewing the utter routing of the Scottish forces.
titleStmt.author: Cromwell, Oliver, 1599-1658.
Ashton, Ralph, 17th cent.

notesStmt.note: Dated and signed on p.5: August 17. 1648. Oliver Cromwell, Ralph Ashton.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
